title: Remove MS from Darkness Rise
body:
Why does a champion with this much damage and survival get a sticking tool? It should tell you something he's being played mid and bot as well just like Aatrox, ranged champions are supposed to be his counter but his E range is so large and he has a ranged ult as well so he can pretty much threaten  any member with being grabbed and short of being a hyperkiting champion like Kayle, Vayne, or Quinn or Ezreal he just dunks on the champs that are supposed to shut him down.

It almost feels like you overbuffed Karma just so that we'd have some cancer to fight cancer with.
